text: Iron Maiden is the first album by British heavy metal band Iron Maiden. It was released on 11th April 1980. The main musical type of the album is heavy metal but some songs, like "Sanctuary" or "Running Free" are like punk rock music. Some fans feel that a song from this album, "Phantom Of The Opera" is the best song Iron Maiden have ever made. ==Musicians== People who were members of Iron Maiden when the album was made: * Steve Harris - Bass guitar * Paul Di'Anno – Singing * Dennis Stratton – Electric guitar * Dave Murray - Electric guitar * Clive Burr - Percussion ==Songs== Category:Iron Maiden albums Category:1980 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Iron Maiden (album)
